sub_features.name: Application Tracing
sub_features.notes: Captures full context of LLM apps including prompts, responses, token usage, latency, and full execution lifecycle.

sub_features.name: Hierarchical Tracing
sub_features.notes: Hierarchical span tracing with parent-child tree visualization, ideal for complex chains and agents.

sub_features.name: Real-time Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Asynchronous background flushing of traces prevents application latency; real-time execution monitoring supported but exact streaming chunk display limitations may exist.

sub_features.name: Multi-Modality Observability
sub_features.notes: Native multi-modality tracing capabilities documented as an advanced observability feature.

sub_features.name: @observe() Decorator
sub_features.notes: One-line auto-instrumentation via decorators and over 100 framework-specific integrations.

sub_features.name: Tags and Metadata
sub_features.notes: Custom metadata, tags, user tracking, and environment assignments supported with advanced UI filtering.

sub_features.name: Token Tracking
sub_features.notes: Accurate tracking of input/output tokens per trace linked to cost analysis.

sub_features.name: OpenTelemetry Compatibility
sub_features.notes: Framework-agnostic integration with native OTEL trace export/import capabilities.

sub_features.name: Retrieval Step Observation
sub_features.notes: Traces retriever steps with semantic types but lacks a highly specialized distinct UI exclusively for visual rendering of documents chunks and relevance.

sub_features.name: Tool Executions
sub_features.notes: Explicit, parsed multi-turn trace observation types for tool and function call inputs/outputs.

sub_features.name: Agent Graphs
sub_features.notes: Visual representation and graph debugging for non-deterministic agent control flows, multi-step workflows, and decision trees.

sub_features.name: Structured Tracing
sub_features.notes: Logs and accurately represents intermediary reasoning and Chain-of-Thought states within the unified nested trace.

sub_features.name: Session Grouping
sub_features.notes: Groups multi-turn interactions or distinct trace lifecycles into replayable thread 'Sessions'.

sub_features.name: Trace Log Levels & Corrections
sub_features.notes: Features visual 'warning' or 'error' log levels highlighting within spans, but not an exclusive agent-failed-step auto-highlighter.

sub_features.name: MCP Tracing & Server
sub_features.notes: Explicit support for Model Context Protocol (MCP) trace gathering and hosting an MCP Server to query data dynamically.

sub_features.name: LLM-as-a-Judge Automation
sub_features.notes: Provides automated model-based evaluation and scoring running asynchronously over trace data; typically configured via SDK/API (wizard GUI implied/partial).

sub_features.name: Observation-level Evaluations
sub_features.notes: Observation-level evaluations enable precise operation-specific scoring for production monitoring.

sub_features.name: Scores API/SDK
sub_features.notes: Author custom programatic evaluation scoring (both human and algorithmic) appending structured 'Scores' to traces.

sub_features.name: Datasets API & Dashboard
sub_features.notes: Provides dataset curation natively linked to project traces. Seamlessly allows conversion of live inputs to evaluation datasets.

sub_features.name: Versioned Datasets
sub_features.notes: Fetch datasets at specific version timestamps and run experiments on historical dataset versions via UI, API, and SDKs for full reproducibility.

sub_features.name: Prompt Experiments
sub_features.notes: Supports robust multi-version testing and experiment tracking, but automated DSPy-style query optimization functionality is not natively available.

sub_features.name: Automated Experiments
sub_features.notes: Ensures prompt configurations don't regress by continually evaluating experiment datasets when model/prompt specs change.

sub_features.name: Prompt A/B Testing
sub_features.notes: Can compare different prompt versions and resulting operational quality scores via experiments; explicit visual side-by-side output panel has limitations.

sub_features.name: Annotation Queues
sub_features.notes: Designed for team workflows offering queue management capabilities to manually review and evaluate specific slices of traces.

sub_features.name: Live Evaluator
sub_features.notes: Real-time asynchronous evaluators set up to inherently trigger against live production traffic to collect continuous scores.

sub_features.name: Data Masking & Redaction Integrations
sub_features.notes: Platform integrates with tooling like LLM Guard to specifically anonymize and redact inputs prior to tracing via `@observe()` and features built-in payload masking.

sub_features.name: Security Measures Observability
sub_features.notes: Relies on external security library integrations (Prompt Armor, NeMo) to instrument run-time protection, observing their latencies and blocking actions on the graph.

sub_features.name: Spend Alerts & Tracking
sub_features.notes: Sophisticated trace cost attribution categorized per-model, per-project, or arbitrary tagging accompanied by configurable Spend Alerts.

sub_features.name: Token Metrics Dashboard
sub_features.notes: Analyzes specific input/output metric shifts, trendline graphs, and unit utilization across all billable events.

sub_features.name: Latency Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Built-in analytics visually monitor application latency spread, including percentile distributions (P99, P95) per prompt/model/action.

sub_features.name: Error Diagnostics
sub_features.notes: Flags structural execution failures natively and visually tracks generalized error rate volumes alongside success flows.

sub_features.name: Custom Dashboards
sub_features.notes: Allows users to create specialized metric widgets to monitor unique use-case evaluation scores or volume analytics tailored to specific tags.

sub_features.name: Prompt CMS
sub_features.notes: Built-in collaborative prompt CMS utilizing message placeholders, config schema definitions, and direct dynamic linking from external repos.

sub_features.name: Interactive Playground
sub_features.notes: Visual sandbox directly within platform linking to prompts; easily interact with variables in real-time.

sub_features.name: Prompt Experiments via SDK/UI
sub_features.notes: Orchestrate, evaluate, and structurally record parameters and quality benchmarks for explicit experimentation runs.

sub_features.name: Prompt Versioning Engine
sub_features.notes: Strict prompt-iteration history maintaining discrete versions, ensuring traceability and safe prompt rollbacks functionality.

sub_features.name: Official Library Integrations
sub_features.notes: Supports major ecosystem packages explicitly distributing Python, JS/TS, and Java officially backed SDKs.

sub_features.name: Proxy Logging Frameworks
sub_features.notes: Operates without direct SDK dependencies leveraging integration with external proxy gateways (LiteLLM, etc.).

sub_features.name: AI Framework Instrumentation
sub_features.notes: Substantial catalog of 100+ native hookups including explicit libraries for LangChain, Autogen, LlamaIndex, OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.

sub_features.name: Observations API & Webhooks
sub_features.notes: Open API platform handling extensive programmatic querying alongside functional outbound Webhooks tied to prompt syncs.

sub_features.name: Langfuse CLI
sub_features.notes: Fully use Langfuse from the CLI. Built for AI agents and power users.

sub_features.name: GitHub Application & Actions
sub_features.notes: Utilizes automated API scripts and a GitHub Integration to sync changes or fetch offline evaluation criteria.

sub_features.name: Flexible Deploy
sub_features.notes: Provisioning includes scalable multi-tenant Cloud endpoints, strict dedicated enterprise instances, or localized self-hosted environments.

sub_features.name: Open Repo Footprint
sub_features.notes: Codebase is transparent and massively adopted via GitHub community offering permissive fundamental architectures.

sub_features.name: Security & Compliance Offerings
sub_features.notes: Designed targeting sensitive organizations providing self-hosting isolation capabilities paired with detailed regulatory compliant data retention policies.

sub_features.name: Access Control (RBAC) & SSO
sub_features.notes: Extends robust administrative controls natively executing deep SCIM/Org API handling alongside Role-Based Access parameters.

sub_features.name: Security Audit Logs
sub_features.notes: Enterprise feature rigorously tracking historical data deletions and internal user modifications directly.

sub_features.name: Blob & Data Platform Sync
sub_features.notes: Automated pipeline egress sending data natively to arbitrary Blob storage frameworks (S3), Mixpanel, Posthog, and ClickHouse.
